title: Open when you're bored.
textContentHtml:
There are times when things feel a bit stagnant and I guess that's what has happened today ðŸ‘€ which made you come here ðŸ‘€

Sometimes even between us, our conversation feels monotonous so maybe you could get bored. But I want you to remember and acknowledge the fact that time mends it all, with little effort and patience we can overcome this phase for both of us ðŸ¥º 

What matters is we both are in love with each other and we're not giving up no matter what ðŸ¤§
